article_title: Four Ways the GOP Can Become the Party of the Sharing Economy

article_metadata.description: The sharing economy has released an entrepreneurial zeal in legions of Americans who haven't run a business since their childhood lemonade stand. As it disrupts more industries and expands from hipster enclaves to suburbs and small towns, more Americans are coming to rely on sharing economy income to maintain or [...]
article_metadata.author: John Kartch
